name: Class BasicDesktopIconUI.MouseInputHandler
text:
Listens for mouse movements and acts on them.

 This class should be treated as a "protected" inner class.
 Instantiate it only within subclasses of BasicDesktopIconUI.

methods.method_sig:
public void moveAndRepaint (JComponent f,
                           int newX,
                           int newY,
                           int newWidth,
                           int newHeight)
methods.description: Moves and repaints a component f.
